ValidationRule.description: If CIF type is AGENCY BRIEFING then please fill the following fields.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(CIF_Type__c, "AGENCY BRIEFING"), OR( (AND( ISBLANK(x3rd_Party_Agency_Name__c), ISBLANK( Client_Agent__c ) )), (AND( ISBLANK(x3rd_Party_Agent_Email__c), ISBLANK(x3rd_Party_Agent_Mobile__c) )), ISBLANK(x3rd_Party_Agent_Name__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PLEASE FILL ALL THE FIELDS MENTIONED IN THE AGENCY REQUIRED DETAILS SECTION.
